translations.START-BEACH.START-DIALOG.INTRO.MESSAGE: You wake up with a start. Your head hurts and you have no idea where you are.
START-BEACH.START-DIALOG.LOOK-AROUND.MES: You are on a beach. The sun is shining, and the sound of waves fills the air.
To the south, you see dunes stretching out, behind them, there is a dense forest.
translations.START-BEACH.START-DIALOG.TRY-TO-REMEMBER: You try to remember how you got here, but your mind is blank.
translations.START-BEACH.START-DIALOG.LOOK-AROUND.CHO: You continue walking along the beach, feeling the sand between your toes.
translations.START-BEACH.START-DIALOG.TRY-TO-REMEMBER: As continue your walk, you feel a sense of calm wash over you, despite the confusion.
